articles.description: Ed Dwight, America’s first Black astronaut candidate, finally rocketed into space 60 years later, flying with Jeff Bezos’ rocket company on Sunday.
articles.content:
VAN HORN, Texas  Ed Dwight, Americas first Black astronaut candidate, finally rocketed into space 60 years later, flying with Jeff Bezos rocket company on Sunday.
